import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Alert, AlertIcon, AlertTitle, AlertDescription, CloseButton, useDisclosure, } from '@chakra-ui/react' const StoreEvent = () => { const [error, setError] = useState({ status: false, msg: "", type: "", desc:"", }) const { isOpen: isVisible, onClose, } = useDisclosure({ defaultIsOpen: true }) const handleSubmit=()=>{ } return ( <>
Name
Email
Password
Confirm Password
{error.status ?
{error.msg} {error.desc}
: ''}
) } export default StoreEvent
